Notes: See IBC 1606 and Chapter 3 of this publication

Load Effect: Combined effect of horizontal and vertical earthquake-induced forces as defined in ASCE/SEI 12.4.2
Notes: See IBC 1613, ASCE/SEI 12.4.2 and Chapter 6 of this publication

Load Effect: Maximum seismic load effect of horizontal and vertical forces as set forth in ASCE/SEI 12.4.3
Notes: See IBC 1613, ASCE/SEI 12.4.3 and Chapter 6 of this publication

Load Effect: Load due to lateral earth pressures, ground water pressure or pressure of bulk materials
Notes: See IBC 1610 for soil lateral loads

Load Effect: Live load, except roof live load, including any permitted live load reduction
Notes: See IBC 1607 and Chapter 3 of this publication

Load Effect: Roof live load including any permitted live load reduction
Notes: See IBC 1607 and Chapter 3 of this publication
See IBC 1611 and Chapter 3 of this publication
